case.state: I'll take just a single shot of martini. I wouldn't want to get drunk before the game even begins.

You did mention your family back in Sinnoh, Cynthia. Could you introduce them to me, sweetie?

I hope you don't mind if we talk about travel this time, Cynthia. Do you really go on trips often due to being a Champion like you said?

How long have you been traveling, Cynthia? Sounds like you've been traveling the world for a long time.

With a face and body like yours, I bet you get a lot of offers for nude pictorials, Cynthia. I would be very surprised if you didn't.
Given your looks and status, I bet all the sexy magazines are very eager to get a photoshoot with you, Cynthia,
That color... I've never seen someone so pale! You almost looks like one of those very old statues! What's your secret, Galatea? I know some people that would want that skin color.

Oh yeah, I almost forgot to ask you. Why were you wearing a disguise in the first place, Lucina?
You must be one of those gamer girls that I keep hearing about. Your appearance is even more striking than I expected.

Aside from playing video games, what is it exactly that you do for a living, Neptune?

Jason, baby. I love Halloween as much as the next guy, but isn't your costume a little too much?

Wow, what an outfit! I know cosplayers put a lot of effort into their costumes, but your outfit is out of this world! That must have taken a lot of time and effort to make!

I'm still curious about which character you're cosplaying as, Laevatein. I don't believe I'm familiar with her.

For a second there, I thought you were wearing one of my film costumes. It's quite distinct, and it molds into your figure quite well, I must say,
I didn't even know that traveling between dimensions was possible, and now I've met someone who does it for fun. I'm just curious what made you come to this dimension, Supernova.

I can't believe I'm currently talking with an inter-dimensional traveler, which I didn't even know was possible before this game. Is there anything about this dimension that made you come here, Supernova?

Wow, you're so special, Supernova! I bet you and all the other superheroes are very famous in your dimension!

That's too bad. With your looks, I bet you can get any men to do your bidding if you wanted to. Maybe even the ladies too.
With your looks, sweetheart, I am sure you can have anything you want with a little sweet talk. Nobody would be able to resist your charms.
Is Falchion your sword? You don't really need a sword for this game. I'm not going to charge at you or anything like that.
Wow, that sounds amazing. I wish my job also allowed me to travel like you. The closest I've got are out-of-state conventions.
It's must be amazing to travel the world as part of your job. I only get out-of-state travels, and only once every two months.
That sounds very interesting, Cynthia. I'll be sure to look up the travel guide for Sinnoh when I get home, whenever that is.

If you say Sinnoh is a good place to visit, then I'll take your word for it, Cynthia. I might even check out some coats that I would buy.

Wow, that sounds very enjoyable and relaxing. It's better than my business trips... well, almost.

I get the part about traveling, but what is a Pokédex, and why are you trying to fill it up? Do you get a reward for it?

Why not?! You're perfect for the job, and it will make you even more popular than you already are. Just think of the fans.

I look quite young for my age, don't I? I don't look a day over 25, but I have the horniness of a 15 year old.
If you think I already look young outside, wait 'till you see what I have under the hood. Quite unbelievable, I have to tell you.
I suppose that true. But not everyone will get the prize by the end of the night. Only the winner would.
So many have tried getting the prize, but so few have succeeded. The reward is all worth it, though.
Oh, I get what you mean. Lucky for you, I am quite the expert in helping men like you relieve their tension. I've been doing my part for more than two decades now.
I can take care of your stress if you're interested. I have perfected the massage technique that would help ease your tension. I've only been doing it for the better part of two decades after all.
This is your first time, then? How are you liking this dimension so far? I bet you're enjoying the view.
I'll take that as hint that you've never been to this dimension. How do you like it here so far? Any particular views that you're enjoying?
How did you get your hands on technology that lets you travel between dimensions, then? That quite a leap in innovation.
If your technology isn't that advanced, where did your inter-dimensional device even come from?

I've never played video games before, but I have used those old joysticks for my movies, in the past...
Yes... Playing with friends is way better than playing with yourself, doesn't it? Now, playing with many friends at the same time... that's just something else entirely...
As much as I love playing with myself, having someone else play with me is much better, no doubt about it. Even better when you have a group of friends playing with you at the same time...

Do you want to know my favorite part of multiplayer? When they plug in their controller and you start having fun immediately. It's even better when it's multiple controllers being plugged in at the same time...
... Oh, is that your persona in the games you play? Sounds really fun. I didn't even know people get paid to play video games.
... I take it that you're being paid to play video games... Either that, or you don't have a job. Regardless, that does sound like an exciting hobby that you can do all day.

... I was vaguely aware that people play games as their job, but I didn't think it was actually true. You seem to be having fun with your job though, and that's quite an interesting character that you've chosen.
Oh, I wasn't talking about your clothes, Jason. I was talking about your sword and mask. It looks very creepy.
I was referrring mostly to that mask, and that sword-thing on your back. It's not something you'd want to see in a dark alley.
I can tell... That's not actual metal, is it? Most people I know just use painted cardboard. You really did go above and beyond a normal costume.
Is my eyesight going bad, or is your armor made of metal? First time I would have seen anything like it. Most costume I've seen used something like cardboard with poster paint.
Does that mean that you can use that portal to have sex with yourself? Like, half-in and half-out through the portal.
I just thought that you can open a portal just beside you, stick your head in, and eat yourself out. That would be the most exciting way of using your portals, wouldn't it?
Not playing a character? You meant your armor is your own design? Wow! That's very creative!
If that's not a character's costume, does that mean that your armor's design was you idea? Very impressive if you ask me.

Why not? Imagine how much cash you can make, considering you're the only inter-dimensional traveler that would be offering that service.

Oh, is that you were?! Well, why didn't you say so?! For a second there, I thought you might have been a serial killer!
